meanings.definition: To surpass in rivalry or competition.
meanings.sent1: She was outrivaling her classmates in the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was outrivaling his opponents in the race.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was outrivaling the birds in gathering nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was outrivaling any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sun was outrivaling the moon in brightness that night.

meanings.definition: To outdo or outperform in a competitive situation.
meanings.sent1: The chef was outrivaling his colleagues in the cooking competition.
meanings.sent2: The team was outrivaling their rivals in the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The clown was outrivaling the magician in making people laugh.
meanings.sent4: His creativity was outrivaling all others in the art show.
meanings.sent5: The waves were outrivaling each other in height during the storm.
